title: Galadriel, Keeper of Nenya (6R18)

Game Text:	At the start of each turn, heal Galadriel. Skirmish: Exert Galadriel to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is a Shadow card, make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -3.
